category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEAllocationLevel
preference.preference_description: Defines the type of process area that can have an operation or process allocation. If no type is defined, there is no limitation on the operation allocation. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values. Each string must be a persistent item subclass, for example: Mfg0MEProcLine The subclass types are not inherited. You must add each new subclass to the preference individually.
